Key Match Events: Bronny James recorded three blocks in his preseason debut.
Bronny James scored his first points with a layup in the final minute of the game.
Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 124-107.
Pre-Game Insights: Lakers coach JJ Redick decided to rest LeBron James and Anthony Davis after three hard days of training camp.
Bronny James expressed excitement and nerves before his debut, stating he was eager to learn from his teammates.
Post-Match Reflections: Bronny James acknowledged the nerves and his excitement to showcase his skills.
Coach JJ Redick explained the decision to rest LeBron James and Anthony Davis, citing their participation over the summer and recent training camp.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Acrisure Arena outside Palm Springs.
LeBron James and Anthony Davis were present in street clothes and interacted with fans and teammates.
The crowd at the 22-month-old arena was enthusiastic, with many fans wearing Lakers jerseys.
